cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ooya

sentence.kanji: ここの大家は近くに住んでいますよ。
sentence.romaji: koko no ooya ha chikaku ni sunde imasu yo
sentence.english: The landlord lives near here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chimei

sentence.kanji: その地名は聞いたことがないなあ。
sentence.romaji: sono chimei ha kiita koto ga nai naa
sentence.english: I have never heard of that place.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gakushuu

sentence.kanji: 今日は野外で学習した。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha yagai de gakushuu shita
sentence.english: We studied outdoors today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sa

sentence.kanji: 都心と地方では収入に大きな差があるね。
sentence.romaji: toshin to chihou de ha shuunyuu ni ooki na sa ga aru ne
sentence.english: There is a big difference in income between rural and urban areas.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jisa

sentence.kanji: 日本とフランスの時差は8時間です。
sentence.romaji: nihon to furansu no jisa ha hachijikan desu
sentence.english: The time difference between Japan and France is eight hours.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sashiageru

sentence.kanji: こちらを差し上げます。
sentence.romaji: kochira wo sashiagemasu
sentence.english: This is for you.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hizashi

sentence.kanji: 今日は日差しが強いですね。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha hizashi ga tsuyoi desu ne
sentence.english: The sun is shining strongly today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakuchi

sentence.kanji: 各地で大雨が降っています。
sentence.romaji: kakuchi de ooame ga fute imasu
sentence.english: Heavy rain is falling in all regions.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's genchi

sentence.kanji: 現地の天気は雨です。
sentence.romaji: genchi no tenki ha ame desu
sentence.english: The local weather is rain.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's genba

sentence.kanji: 事故現場には入れません。
sentence.romaji: jiko genba ni ha hairemasen
sentence.english: You can't enter the accident scene.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youfuu

sentence.kanji: 私は洋風の家に住んでいます。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha youfuu no ie ni sunde imasu
sentence.english: I live in a Western-style house.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's touyou

sentence.kanji: 彼は東洋文化を研究しているよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha touyoubunka wo kenkyuu shite iru yo
sentence.english: He researches Asian culture.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's minarau

sentence.kanji: 彼を見習ってもっと勉強します。
sentence.romaji: kare wo minarate moto benkyou shimasu
sentence.english: I'll follow his example and study harder.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youshiki

sentence.kanji: 彼の家のトイレは洋式です。
sentence.romaji: kare no ie no toire ha youshiki desu
sentence.english: His house has a Western-style toilet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yanushi

sentence.kanji: 家主は1階に住んでいます。
sentence.romaji: yanushi ha 1 kai ni sunde imasu
sentence.english: The landlord lives on the first floor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sabetsu

sentence.kanji: 彼は差別をなくす運動をしています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sabetsu wo nakusu undou wo shite imasu
sentence.english: He is working to end discrimination.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mokutekichi

sentence.kanji: やっと目的地に着いたよ。
sentence.romaji: yato mokutekichi ni tsuita yo
sentence.english: I finally arrived at the destination.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakutei

sentence.kanji: 試合の代表メンバーが確定したの。
sentence.romaji: shiai no daihyou menba- ga kakutei shita no
sentence.english: The game's team members have been decided.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kagu

sentence.kanji: 部屋の家具を動かしました。
sentence.romaji: heya no kagu wo ugokashimashita
sentence.english: I moved the furniture in the room.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shougo

sentence.kanji: 昼休みは正午からです。
sentence.romaji: hiruyasumi ha shougo kara desu
sentence.english: The lunch break is from noon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tasei

sentence.kanji: 彼は今月の売上目標を達成した。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kongetsu no uriage mokuhyou wo tasei shita
sentence.english: He achieved the sales target this month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's meikaku

sentence.kanji: 彼女には明確な目標があるね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ni ha meikaku na mokuhyou ga aru ne
sentence.english: She has a clear aim.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's anki

sentence.kanji: 試験の前に英文を暗記したんだ。
sentence.romaji: shiken no mae ni eibun wo anki shita n da
sentence.english: I memorized the English text before the examination.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaisei

sentence.kanji: 近く交通法が改正されます。
sentence.romaji: chikaku koutsuu hou ga kaisei saremasu
sentence.english: Traffic regulations will soon be revised.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aratameru

sentence.kanji: 彼は悪い習慣を改めようとしているわね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha warui shuukan wo aratameyou to shite iru wa ne
sentence.english: He's trying to change his bad habits.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aratamete

sentence.kanji: 改めてあなたのご意見を聞かせて下さい。
sentence.romaji: aratamete anata no goiken wo kikase te kudasai
sentence.english: Please let me hear your opinion again.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aratamaru

sentence.kanji: 年号が改まりました。
sentence.romaji: nengou ga aratamarimashita
sentence.english: The name of the era has changed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinpo

sentence.kanji: 科学技術は目覚しく進歩しているの。
sentence.romaji: kagaku gijutsu ha mezamashiku shinpo shite iru no
sentence.english: Science and technology have advanced remarkably.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shijou

sentence.kanji: デジカメ市場は急速に拡大している。
sentence.romaji: dejikame shijou ha kyuusoku ni kakudai shite iru
sentence.english: The digital camera market has expanded rapidly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakei

sentence.kanji: 彼女は家計を任されているの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kakei wo makasarete iru no
sentence.english: She's in charge of the family budget.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's denshi

sentence.kanji: 電子辞書はとても便利です。
sentence.romaji: denshi jisho ha totemo benri desu
sentence.english: Electronic dictionaries are very useful.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suijun

sentence.kanji: 今年の応募作品は水準が高かったね。
sentence.romaji: kotoshi no oubo sakuhin ha suijun ga takakata ne
sentence.english: The standard of entries this year was high.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuuchuu

sentence.kanji: 勉強に集中しなさい。
sentence.romaji: benkyou ni shuuchuu shinasai
sentence.english: Concentrate on studying.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuugou

sentence.kanji: 7時5分に駅で集合しましょう。
sentence.romaji: shichi ji go fun ni eki de shuugou shimashou
sentence.english: Let's meet at the station at 7:05

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atsumari

sentence.kanji: 雨で集まりが悪いですね。
sentence.romaji: ame de atsumari ga warui desu ne
sentence.english: Not many people are showing up because of the rain.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mizugi

sentence.kanji: 水着に着替えました。
sentence.romaji: mizugi ni kigaemashita
sentence.english: I changed into a swimsuit.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ubau

sentence.kanji: その男は彼女のバッグを奪ったぞ。
sentence.romaji: sono otoko ha kanojo no bagu wo ubata zo
sentence.english: That man stole her bag.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's konzatsu

sentence.kanji: 今日はデパートが混雑していたよ。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha depa-to ga konzatsu shite ita yo
sentence.english: The department store was crowded today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ochitsuku

sentence.kanji: 私の話を落ち着いて聞いてください。
sentence.romaji: watashi no hanashi wo ochitsuite kiite kudasai
sentence.english: Calm down and listen to me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ochitsuki

sentence.kanji: 弟は落ち着きが足りません。
sentence.romaji: otouto ha ochitsuki ga tarimasen
sentence.english: My little brother is too restless.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kitakaze

sentence.kanji: 北風が冷たいです。
sentence.romaji: kitakaze ga tsumetai desu
sentence.english: The north wind is cold.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuukei

sentence.kanji: 私は山の風景が好きです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha yama no fuukei ga suki desu
sentence.english: I like mountain scenery.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyakanteki

sentence.kanji: 彼は自分の状況を客観的に見てみたのね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha jibun no joukyou wo kyakanteki ni mite mita no ne
sentence.english: He tried to look at his situation objectively.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shukan

sentence.kanji: 主観だけで物事を見てはいけない。
sentence.romaji: shukan dake de monogoto wo mite ha ikenai
sentence.english: You shouldn't look at things merely subjectively.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shukanteki

sentence.kanji: それは主観的な意見だ。
sentence.romaji: sore ha shukanteki na iken da
sentence.english: That is a subjective opinion.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kankou

sentence.kanji: 京都で3日間観光しました。
sentence.romaji: kyouto de mikakan kankou shimashita
sentence.english: I went sightseeing for three days in Kyoto.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kansoku

sentence.kanji: 先生が星の観測に連れて行ってくれました。
sentence.romaji: sensei ga hoshi no kansoku ni tsurete ite kuremashita
sentence.english: The teacher took us to observe the stars.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yoriatsumaru

sentence.kanji: ニューヨークには芸術家が寄り集まっているの。
sentence.romaji: nyu-yo-ku ni ha geijutsuka ga yoriatsumate iru no
sentence.english: New York is a place where artists meet and come together.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gaikan

sentence.kanji: そのモダンな外観の建物が大使館です。
sentence.romaji: sono modan na gaikan no tatemono ga taishikan desu
sentence.english: That building with the modern exterior is the embassy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's souba

sentence.kanji: この辺りの家賃の相場はいくらですか。
sentence.romaji: kono atari no yachin no souba ha ikura desu ka
sentence.english: What is the going rate for rent around here?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakuritsu

sentence.kanji: 北欧では社会保障が確立されています。
sentence.romaji: hokuou de ha shakai hoshou ga kakuritsu sarete imasu
sentence.english: Social security has been established in Northern Europe.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chitai

sentence.kanji: この都市は工業地帯です。
sentence.romaji: kono toshi ha kougyou chitai desu
sentence.english: This city is an industrial zone.
